content: Singaporean Indian Tamil actress **Udaya Soundari** (born 28 April 1988) is a [Singaporean](/wiki/Singaporeans) Indian television actress and television presenter. She has appeared in films such as *[Parandhu Sella Vaa](/wiki/Parandhu_Sella_Vaa)* (2016) and *[A Yellow Bird](/wiki/A_Yellow_Bird)* (2016). She is also the first person in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) to win three awards in one year at the *[Pradhana Vizha](/wiki/Pradhana_Vizha)* festival. ## Personal life Udaya was born and raised in Singapore. She also has a younger sister who is also a television actress called Malene. ### Sex scandal controversy In 2015, a [sex tape](/wiki/Sex_tape) appeared in social media featuring a woman looking like Udaya. Udaya said that it was not her.
